data.title: James Cagney
data.meta_description: Explore the filmography of James Cagney on Rotten Tomatoes! Discover ratings, reviews, and more. Click for details!
data.text:
Highest Rated: 100% Footlight Parade (1933)

Lowest Rated: 43% Johnny Come Lately (1943)

Birthday: Jul 17, 1899

Birthplace: New York, New York, USA

The American gangster film, and the output of Warner Bros. in its most influential decade, would be unimaginable without the contributions of James Cagney. One of talking pictures' first generation of actors, Cagney forever romanticized the figures of the criminal and the con artist with his jittery physical dynamism and breakneck staccato vocal patterns.

Highest rated movies

100% Captains of the Clouds

100% The Strawberry Blonde

100% The Roaring Twenties

100% Angels With Dirty Faces

100% Ceiling Zero

100% Footlight Parade

100% The Public Enemy
